timeline.bodyText:
We need to for error recovery here, if the next token is not the on keyword nor any statement-starting token.
eg: missing on keyword, but the rest is present from the fail keyword.
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: Seems on on fail clause is not optional.
replies.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: According to the grammar, fail keyword is not optional.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Shall we add the grammar rule as a doc comment?
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: grammar rule seems to be incorrect
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText:
Need to update the doc comment with the new grammar.
Applicable for all places.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText:
Shall we add some negative tests as well?
eg: missing certain parts of the on-fail-clause, having additional tokens in between the tokens in on-fail-clause, etc.
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: We'll improve error handling and negative test cases separately. Created #25711 to track the progress.
replies.author: pcnfernando
